archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0868
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Revenue Assurance Analyst I want be able to track and report on all suspended or unrated usage from our mediation and rating systems so that we can ensure there is no revenue leakage and we are capturing all revenue for the services we have provided

properties.value: Reted CDRs feed from Comarch is needed. Assumption: to be compared with unrated CDRs coming from mediation.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
